blockers.description: Offline baseline (41%) indistinguishable from random guess due to missing Clingo.
N=24 provides CI too wide for publication.

votes.rationale: Baseline 41% is a statistical artifact of missing dependencies, not a valid starting point.
Simplification is good, but B0's true potential (72%) is masked by infra issues.
Mandatory. No scientific claim can be made without environment parity (clingo/fitz).

notes: NORMALIZATION NOTE: Original Gemini ballot had 'decision'→'vote', 'reason'→'rationale', agent 'Gemini'→'gemini'. Scores and positions preserved exactly from original raw ballot. Prior normalization had incorrectly altered P1 from reject(1) to abstain(2) and P4 from approve(5) to approve(3) — restored to original.
